ceterms:description:
Global business is powered by project management. Leaders need interdisciplinary knowledge to understand complexities, such as e-commerce and earned value analysis. In most MBA programs, students learn from case studies. Choose BU and learn from expert faculty—who actually worked on the projects that inspired the case studies.

Complete your master’s degree online in 12 courses or less
Learn why BU grads rank 13th in the nation for employability
Differentiate your credentials—BU’s graduate programs in management rank 10th in the U.S. News & World Report rankings of Best Online Graduate Business Programs
ceterms:name: Master of Science in Project Management

ceterms:occupationType.ceterms:targetNodeDescription: Direct an organization's security functions, including physical security and safety of employees, facilities, and assets.
